thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 25 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Adler Real Estate Updates 2017 Guidance

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Adler Real Estate Updates 2017 Guidance
text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - ADLER REAL ESTATE AG:
* UPDATING 2017 GUIDANCE * AVERAGE RENT IN CORE PORTFOLIO HAD REACHED EUR 5.11 PER SQM/MONTH AT NINE MONTHS STAGE
* TARGET OF 3 PERCENT INCREASE IN RENTAL INCOME INCLUDING VACANCY REDUCTION COULD REACH C.3.5% FOR FY17
* 2017 WACD, WHICH STOOD AT 3.69% AS OF FY 16 IS EXPECTED TO FALL TO AROUND 2.7% PERCENT
* OTHER GUIDED FIGURES SUCH AS FFO I AND EPRA NAV ARE EXPECTED TO MEET REPORTED 2017 GUIDANCE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
